Kyle Dargan bụ onye Amerịka na-ede uri
Ọ bụ onye dere nchịkọta uri ise
Dargan bụ ugbu onye Prọfeso só akuzi literature na onye enyemaka directọ nke creative writing na American University.
A mụrụ Dargan na Newark, New Jersey
Ọ natara BA na Mahadum Virginia na MFA na Mahadim Indiana.
Mahadum Georgia Press bipụtara nchịkọta abụ anọ mbụ nke Dargan
Nchịkọta mbụ ya, The Listening (2004), bụ onye natara Cave Canem Poetry Prize n'afọ 2004
Nchịkọta nke abụọ ya, Bouquet of Hungers (2007), nyere ya Hurston/Wright Legacy Award na uri n'afọ 2008
E bipụtara "Logorrhea Dementia" n'afọ 2010 ma bipụta Honest Engine n'afọ 2015
Akwụkwọ nke ise Dargan, Anagnorisis, (Triquarterly, 2018), meriri Lenore Marshall Poetry Prize site na Academy of American Poets n'afọ 2018.
Dargan bụ ugbu onye Prọfeso só akuzi literature na onye enyemaka directọ nke creativector of creaMahadumtAmerican
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin POST NO ILLS
